infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to record cricket videos for analysis.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select cricket videos for analysis.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record cricket videos.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select cricket videos for analysis.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Cricket Coach to access your camera to record cricket videos.
